text: Bhagadatta was a king of the ancient Indian kingdom of Pragjyotisha. Bhagadatta may also refer to: *Bhagadatta (Langkasuka), a 6th-century King of the Langkasuka empire *Bhagadatta (of Chanasa), a 10th-century King of Dvaravati *Bhagadatta austenia, an (older) alternative name of the butterfly species Limenitis austenia
title: Bhagadatta (disambiguation)
